embed_delete_footer: This message will delete in {{seconds}} seconds.
help_module_message: Use `.taco help {{command}}` for help on this command set.
help_no_command: The command `{{command}}` is not found in the help.
error_occurred: {{user}}, There was an error trying to complete your request. The error has been logged. I am very sorry.
not_initialized_user:
{{user}}, I am not initialized yet. Please try again in a few minutes.

If you are still having issues, please contact the an administrator.
not_initialized_admin: {{user}}, I am not initialized yet. Please run {{prefix}}init {{subcommand}} to initialize.
ask_name_of_channel: Enter the name of the channel
unknown_channel: {{user}}, The channel id ({{channel_id}}) is not a valid channel.
restricted_default_deny_message: That message is not allowed in this channel.
taco_gift_limit_exceeded: {{user}, You can only gift between 1 and {{remaining}} {{taco_word}}.
taco_gift_maximum: You have reached the maximum amount of gifts you can give. You can only give {{max} {{taco_word}} per 24 hours.
twitch_name_question: You have requested to join the **{{team_name}}** twitch team, please respond with your twitch username.
twitch_name_dm_error:
{{user}}, I was unable to send you a message to set your twitch name.
Please use `.taco twitch set` in a discord channel.
streamteam_removal_message:
{{user}} has requested to be removed from the **{{team_name}}** twitch team.

Twitch Name: `{{twitch_name}}`
streamteam_join_message:
{{user}} has requested to join the **{{team_name}}** twitch team.

Twitch Name: `{{twitch_name}}`
streamteam_set_twitch_name_message:
Your Twitch name has been recorded as `{{twitch_name}}`. Keep an eye out for an invite.

Go here: https://dashboard.twitch.tv/u/{{twitch_name}}/settings/channel

Twitch Dashboard -> Settings -> Channel -> Featured Content => Scroll to the bottom.

If you change your twitch name in the future, you can use `.taco twitch set` in a discord channel, or `.twitch set` in the DM with me.
streamteam_invite_no_twitch_name_message: You have not set your twitch name yet. Please do so with `.taco twitch set`.
streamteam_invite_success_message:
A request has been made for {{user}} to be added to join the **{{team_name}}** stream team.

Keep an eye out for your invite.

Go here: https://dashboard.twitch.tv/u/{{twitch_name}}/settings/channel

Twitch Dashboard -> Settings -> Channel -> Featured Content => Scroll to the bottom.

If you change your twitch name in the future, you can use `.taco twitch set` in a discord channel, or `.twitch set` in a DM with me.
trivia_results_message:
{{question}}

The correct answer was **{{correct_emoji}} {{correct_answer}}**

Correct answers receive {{reward}} {{taco_word}} 🌮.
Incorrect answers lose {{reward}} {{taco_word}} 🌮.

`.taco trivia` to play again.
birthday_set_month_question: What month is your birthday? (use numbers 1 - 12)
birthday_set_day_question: What day is your birthday? (use numbers 1 - 31)
birthday_set_confirm:
{{user}}, your birthday has been set.

`.taco birthday` to change it.
